dcterms:creator: B. Han
A. Rahimi
L. Derczynski
T. Baldwin
dcterms:description: A dataset constructed to enhance user geolocation performance by incorporating rich metadata from user profiles and tweets, containing 7,789 users from 1,261 cities worldwide.
dcterms:title: TwiU

dcterms:creator: B. Thomee
D. A. Shamma
G. Friedland
B. Elizalde
K. Ni
D. Poland
D. Borth
L. J. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the YFCC-100M dataset, containing geotagged Flickr posts with enriched user profiles, focused on the United States, comprising 11,395 users from 1,688 distinct US cities.
dcterms:title: FliU
